body_html:
OK thanks. Got it working.

For the records:

  • tell the configure.sh script to use /usr/bin/gcc

  • put cuda 7.5 and cudnn 5.1.3 in the same folder (can be in $HOME)

  • export CC=/usr/bin/gcc

  • modify third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl by adding the following line (showed by a + sign below):

    +cpu_compiler_flags.append('-fno-use-linker-plugin')
    return subprocess.call([CPU_COMPILER] + cpu_compiler_flags)
body_text:
OK thanks. Got it working.
For the records:


tell the configure.sh script to use /usr/bin/gcc


put cuda 7.5 and cudnn 5.1.3 in the same folder (can be in $HOME)


export CC=/usr/bin/gcc


modify third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl by adding the following line (showed by a + sign below):
+cpu_compiler_flags.append('-fno-use-linker-plugin')
return subprocess.call([CPU_COMPILER] + cpu_compiler_flags)
body:
OK thanks. Got it working.

For the records:
- tell the configure.sh script to use /usr/bin/gcc 
- put cuda 7.5 and cudnn 5.1.3 in the same folder (can be in $HOME)
- export CC=/usr/bin/gcc
- modify third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl by adding the following line (showed by a + sign below):
  
  +cpu_compiler_flags.append('-fno-use-linker-plugin')
    return subprocess.call([CPU_COMPILER] + cpu_compiler_flags)
